description: '''Studio''' was a [[Sweden|Swedish]] musical duo consisting of [[Dan Lissvik]] and Rasmus Hägg, founded by Lissvik (Atelje) in 2000 at [[Valand Academy|Valand School of Fine Arts]] . Studio have been described as the missing link between [[The Cure]] and [[Hans-Peter Lindstrøm|Lindstrøm]] – while simultaneously touching upon [[Can (band)|Can]], [[Neu]], [[Happy Mondays]] and [[The Smiths]] –  in their creation of an "[[afrobeat]]-[[dub music|dub]]-[[disco]]-[[indie pop|indie]]-[[pop music|pop]]" adventure. Their album ''[[West Coast (album)|West Coast]]'' was chosen by [[Rough Trade Shop|Rough Trade]] in [[London]] as one of the 10 best albums of 2007 and they have remixed artists such as [[Kylie Minogue]] and A Mountain of One.
